name: Blain Home
overview: Blain Home is a platform game, very arcade where you control Blain in a very special mission, destroy gas containers that have been hidden in various places in various locations. To do this you have a minigum 134 and your skills to avoid all the dangers arising from the mission. Where did this game come from? Since the Predator movie was released in the late 1980s, it is a topic that has often come up in conversations with many friends, we repeat phrases, comment on scenes and speculate about the characters. One of the most attractive to us is Blain and his automatic machine gun. In addition to this weapon, it has a macho man's arsenal that would give any defender of current feminism goosebumps. Phrases like: Here we go, bastards. I don't have time to bleed and of course that great phrase of keep it up and you will become sexual Tyrannosaurus. They have accompanied us throughout our lives, endorsing them to friends as soon as an occasion called for it and receiving them equally. Blain had his friend inseparable from him Mac from him who dedicated that great phrase to him: Blain, Blain. Does it remind you of home? I guess both friends missed home, hence the game's title Blain Home. Referring to the fact that when Blain finishes his mission he goes to his home.
